name: Slashing
description: Damage from cutting and slicing attacks using bladed weapons, claws, and other sharp-edged implements that rend flesh and sever limbs.

vulnerabilityCommon: Some creatures with soft tissue (DM discretion)

specialRules: Common damage type for melee weapons
Many two-handed weapons deal slashing damage
Natural weapon attacks (claws) often deal slashing damage
Resistance to nonmagical slashing is common among certain creatures
Can be used to cut ropes, vines, and similar objects
Blade Barrier creates a wall of slashing damage
